name: POI - Best Of
profile:
Welcome on POI - Best Of !

On this channel, you can find a lot of best scenes of Person of Interest, the great TV show.
Thanks to your comments, new best of will be created and put on this channel.

If you want a special scene from Person of Interest that you love which is not on this channel, tell me through a comment under a video and I'll certainly make it.

All videos on this channel needs subtitles, so if you have talent in translation don't hesitate to make those subtitles, I always allow them for all languages, so you will be a great helper !

For those who don't speak english, I can speak french too if it's needed.

I do not own anything for those videos, all belongs to the creators of Person of Interest.
